content: my 100th pattern imagine is a gift to you to thank you for all your support along the way there s absolutely no way i could have come this far without the support and encouragement of every one of you who made my patterns and liked them enough to pay for some of them it s also the september 2019 square for the 2019 crochet block a month cal 1 here on ravelry a wonderful group and event that i m always excited to design for check them out visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 2 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 3 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 4 visiting polly s place on ravelry 5 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 6 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 7 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/2019-crochet-block-a-month-cal 2 everytrickonthehook com 3 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 4 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 5 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 6 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 7 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
